welcome_message_body: Welcome to Chino Hills! Enjoy the city's charming suburban atmosphere and picturesque landscapes. Take some time to explore our beautiful parks, hiking trails, and local dining spots. We hope you have a wonderful time discovering all that Chino Hills has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chino Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Chino Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cable Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Cable Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect for free with a valid boarding pass.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Compton Airport offers a variety of services for travelers, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and dining options.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Compton Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering luxurious amenities such as a VIP lounge and concierge services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barstow-Daggett Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Barstow-Daggett Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whiteman Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and general aviation flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
